about_the_game:
Deathwave Aftermath is a classic turn based RPG with a character creation system that lets you choose how you want to play the game.

  • Meet and recruit a wide variety of companions.
  • Enjoy discovering a semi-broken country that is still recovering from the effects of the deathwave.
  • Explore the large open world completing quests
  • Learn about the world and its variety of inhabitants.

So join the world of Deathwave Aftermath. It's been 100 years since the world ended... kind of. You are a scavenger that has lived their whole life in the wasteland until your whole world gets turned upside down sending you on a journey around the North American Coalition against an unknown threat. Will you survive and save what's left of North America or will you fail and see it all fall to ruin?

short_description: Deathwave Aftermath is an open world post-apocalyptic turn-based strategy game inspired by classic games like Final Fantasy and Chrono Trigger but with a higher focus on giving you control over how your character is built.
